OsgoodSchlatter disease (OSD), also known as apophysitis of the tibial tubercle
, or Lannelongue's disease, is an inflammation of the patellar ligament at the 
tibial tuberosity. It is characterized by a painful bump just below the knee and is 
most often seen in young adolescents. ... Ultrasonography can detect if there is
